attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks are a tradition for several celebrations and are lovely to look at. However, the noise of unnecessary. We are asking for the noises to be significantly reduced and if possible silent so everyone can continue to enjoy them. Fireworks effect not only people’s with sensory disabilities, PTSD, elderly people, children etc. it can also effect animals, causes them to become scared, anxious and can sometimes lead to death

This is just a small part of it, the list of reasoning is endless.
attributes.background:
Whilst fireworks are pretty to look at, the noise is unnecessary. 
This effects not only people’s with sensory disabilities, PTSD, elderly people, children etc. it can also effect animals, causes them to become scared, anxious and can sometimes lead to death

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
